about_the_game:
Warning!!!

This is not the kind of Anime Horror Puzzle RPG you played before!!!

The game contains a lot of adult elements, including but not limited to: blood, violence, brutal graphics, severed limbs, sudden frightening screens, suppressed noises, psychological cues, flashes and other extremely uncomfortable elements!

Think carefully about whether this is the type of game you're looking for, and if you're looking for a creepy but fun gaming experience, you might be at the right place!

"Have you heard that rumor?"

"There is a terrible legend in the house in the distance..."

"The old man who used to live there was considerate and kind and helped everyone do a lot of things..."

"But I didn't expect it, and I don't know what happened, the whole family was not spared..."

"The grapevine says that the frightened "Spiritualist Society" did it..."

"The poor maid has been hit hard psychologically..."

"So far..."

Characters

Hello everyone, we are Muharukahana Studios, and our indie game "Margarita(Berkeley's Maid: Remake Edition)" is a complete remake of the acclaimed horror game "Berkeley's Maid" that we launched in mobile platform, with a richer and more complete plot, more diverse gameplay, and more distinctive puzzle design.

The remake version is based on the RPG Maker MZ, a survival horror + psychological horror-based pixel horror RPG in which you play as a maid named Nordisy.

Gameplay Features

There are so many things you need to do!

Puzzles and Exploring!

A mysterious home with hidden secrets, perhaps related to your deceased father.

However, the deeper you fall, the more you fall, you can only solve the puzzle in a terrifying environment and find a way out...

{STEAM_APP_IMAGE}/extras/Gamaplay3.gif

Challenge yourself to a well-designed survival challenge and battle the unpredictable environment under extreme stress!

{STEAM_APP_IMAGE}/extras/gameplay2.gif

To live to see people, to die to see corpses, only time can answer everything

{STEAM_APP_IMAGE}/extras/gameplay4.gif

But maybe you don't want to know the truth as much as you think?

"The poor maid has been hit hard psychologically..."

"So far... They are still serving the corpses on the bed..."

Coming Soon
